nodes.text: The Promenade was a glitzy and extravagant commercial district of Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. The area was run by the Hutts of the Hutt Cartel and boasted casinos, boutiques, and a massive golden statue of Karagga in the center of the Promenade square.
The district was known for being the safest and most "legitimate" on the Smuggler's Moon. Every Hutt clan contributed a portion of their security force to maintain its order and safety.
